title: A Day in the Life at Green Valley Farm
title_pt: Um dia na vida na Fazenda Vale Verde
text: Greenhouse climate control. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We apply rotational grazing protocols for pasture recovery. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. We assess soil nutrients to optimize fertilization plans. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft.
